mapper.select:
SELECT a.id, a.title, a.content, a.category_id as categoryId, a.type_id as typeId, a.clicks, a.hasOriginal, a.create_time as createTime, a.update_time as updateTime, c.name as categoryName, c.value as categoryValue, d.dic_name as dicName, dic_code as dicCode, dic_type as dicType, FROM tab_article a left join tab_category c on c.id = a.category_id left join sys_dic d on d.id = a.type_id WHERE 1=1
and (dic_name like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%') or UPPER(dic_code) like UPPER(CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%')) or dic_type like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%'))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_dic (id, dic_name, dic_code, dic_type, create_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{dicName}, #{dicCode}, #{dicType}, #{createTime});
